title: Parrot Voice Controlled Bluetooth Kit MINIKITONEO Overview
description:
Buy Parrot MINIKITNEO Voice Controlled Bluetooth Hands-Free Kit - http://www.abt.com/product/64308/Parrot-MINIKITNEO.html

Features:
• Control the MINIKIT Neo by voice
Say the key word 'MINIKIT' at any time to trigger the voice recognition and then say the name of the contact. 
• Great sound quality
Digital Signal Processing allows a drastic reduction of noise and a strong echo cancellation. 
• Hours of conversation
Enjoy six month of standby with Ultra Low Power Mode. The MINIKIT Neo will tell you the remaining battery time vocally upon request. 
• Automatically activated
The kit integrates a vibration sensor to automatically switch on when you get in your car. 
• Connect two phones at once
Thanks to the Switch function you can use both phonebooks to make calls! 
• Easy update
Benefit from new features or change the language of your MINIKIT Neo by downloading new software versions for free. 
• Simple pairing
The MINIKIT Neo will vocally guide you through the entire pairing process. Once your phone is paired the Bluetooth connection with the kit is absolutely automatic. 
• Listen to your music
You can listen to all your music on your phone and benefit from the voice commands of your navigation app directly on your kit. 
• All your contacts on your kit
Synchronisation with your phonebook is automatic and all menus are vocal so you can stay focused on driving. 
• All these benefits are integrated in a compact and sleek design
The integrated clipping system is compatible with all sun -visors and can be reversed easily with only one hand when you fold or unfold the sun visor.
